text: Richard Anthony "Dick" Wolf (born December 20, 1946) is an American producer. He is best known for creating the Law & Order television series as well as its American spin-offs. He has a star on the Holywood Walk of Fame, and he has won an Emmy Award. ==References== * Dick Wolf Net Worth Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:Emmy Award winners Category:People from New York City
title: Dick Wolf
